response.original_title: Kobe: The Life of A Legend
response.overview: What goes into making a legend? In the world of sports few names are as synonymous with the game they played as Kobe Bryant is to basketball. Simply put, he was one of the greatest of all time and his life and his legacy will be celebrated for lifetimes to come. Join us now as we take a look at Kobe Bryant and The Life Of A Legend.
response.title: Kobe: The Life of A Legend
